name: Madame A Trois - Royal Tron Trio
description: Vintage china Madame A Trois trio in pastel aqua green with a gold floral spray design. These vintage pieces we have sourced for the Madame a Trois trios are from the 1920’s to the 1960’s. We can’t tell you which ones are our favourite – 50’s gold stars, rosebud chintz, Art Deco geometric, lacy floral spray or hand painted spring posies? We have chosen them for the gorgous patterns and colours, anything that would look pretty in Maison Bertaux next to the SONIA by Sonia Rykiel and A.P.C. frocks and even prettier on your tea table. All of the Madame A Trois sets are in vintage condition. The photo accurately represents the state of this item. None of the items have chips or cracks. However if you feel a little uncomfortable buying vintage online, please come and visit us at at the store where an ever greater range will be available for you to choose from. This item will be sent within the UK only. Post and packaging charge is £4.95 which is added when you check out.
